newsitem.title: ITALY: Olivetti telecoms director Pompei resigns.
newsitem.headline: Olivetti telecoms director Pompei resigns.

text.p: Olivetti's director of policy and strategy for its telecoms interests Tommaso Pompei has resigned, a spokesman for the company confirmed on Tuesday.
Olivetti's new chief executive Roberto Colaninno had indicated late last week that the group was looking for a new appointment to head its telecoms strategy.
Sources close to the company said that Olivetti was now looking for someone with greater international experience for the post.
Colaninno had also indicated last week that the group was looking for appointments in external relations and business development, positions which are currently vacant.
